page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF STEVEN
page.content: school. Before play we do maths, reading laboratory and handwriting. Then we go to assembly. The teacher reads us a story about things that go wrong. Then it's playtime. Rob gets his frisby and we play catch on the field. The frisby comes towards me but the wind gets hold of it and it sails up on the roof. We ask the teacher if we can get it down. Dingerlingerling! The bell goes. Back to work. We do geography, spelling and watch a TV programme. At 11.30 we write a horror story called "All Dead", with Dracula and Frankenstein. Dingerling! Save my day! The dinner bell goes at last! We have jelly and blancmange for afters. Out to play for a game of rounders. My team wins 10 to 8. I scored 4 of them. Back into school a bit early to get the painting equipment out. I paint a picture of our rounders game and stay
